cheatsheet.title: On-device Stop Mode Debugging Setup

intro.description: Follow these steps to create a project, build it, and debug it on a remote device connected using CODA.

item.title: Verify that your SDK is recognized by Carbide.
item.description: Verify that your SDK or customer kit is recognized in the Symbian SDKs panel.

item.title: Create or import project to debug
item.description: Create project or Import the project's bld.inf file into Carbide.c++.

item.title: Build project using the ARM compiler
item.description: Build your Project using the ARM compiler.

item.title: Create a Symbian Device launch configuration
item.description: Click the Debug icon in the toolbar to launch the New Launch Configuration Wizard. Fill in the necessary info.
